mapper.update: UPDATE mk_community_article SET collect_num = collect_num + 1 WHERE id = ${articleId}
UPDATE mk_community_article SET praise_num = praise_num + 1 WHERE id = ${articleId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, c.title category_title, u.nickname, IF(f.state = 0, f.path, NULL) avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mk_community_comment WHERE root_id = a.id) comment_num FROM mk_community_article a LEFT JOIN mk_community_category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN mk_user u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN mk_file f ON u.avatar = f.id WHERE a.category_id = ${categoryId} ORDER BY IF(${type} = 1, a.create_time, a.update_time) DESC
